body.name: Air Purifiers, Home Air purifier for Large Room Bedroom Up to 1560ft², VEWIOR H13 True HEPA Air Filter for Wildfire Smoke Pets Pollen Odor, with Air Quality Monitoring Light, Auto/Sleep Mode, 6 Timer
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 17 hrs 48 mins
FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 17 hrs 48 mins
features: [Efficient H13 HEPA Filter Purification] VEWIOR air purifier uses an H13 True HEPA Filter and has international CARB certification, FCC certification, ETL certification, etc., so it can easily filter particles as small as 0.2 microns in the air, such as dust, smoke, pollen, hair, and odor. Featuring 360° air intake and top outlet, the A2 air purifier refreshes the air 5x per hour in rooms up to 1560 ft² in one hour.

[Smart Air Quality Monitoring with Light] Air quality monitoring is one of the biggest features of this VEWIOR air purifier. And the built-in air quality sensor can intelligently detect the surrounding PM2.5 value. Purification is clearly visible. There have three colors of air quality lights, with the "Light" button controlling on/off, which represent excellent (green), good (blue), and poor (red) air quality.

[Ultra-quiet Sleep & Convenient Timer] In ultra-quiet sleep mode, the air purifier will filter air at the lowest noise level of 15 dB and all lights will turn off. It is even quieter than the first level fan speed, bringing you a peaceful sleep while breathing fresh air in the night. This air cleaner also has a 2/4/6/8/10/12H timing function for energy power saving, so you don't worry about when sleeping or being away from home.

[Intelligent Auto Mode & Child Lock] When you don't know which speed to use, the auto mode is your best choice. The air purifier will automatically select and run the appropriate gear according to the current air quality. The child lock function can also lock your current setting, avoiding any accidental touching from your kids and pets.

[Special High-efficiency Purification Speed] VEWIOR air purifier has four adjustable fan speeds, a basic speed button of 1/2/3 gear and the high-efficiency 4 gear cleaning with separate buttons. When you are in the terrible air of household odor, pet dander, pollen, smoke, decoration pollutants, etc., you can directly select the high-efficiency purification mode to bring you fresh air more efficiently and faster.

[Filter Replacement Reminder] When the air filter has 100 hours left to be used, the indicator will keep flashing to remind you that a new filter needs to be prepared for replacement. And you can check the remaining time of the air filter via the filter button when it is less than 1000 hours. Please long-press the ”FILTER“' button to reset the usage time after replacing the filter. For the health of you and your family, we recommend replacing the filter cartridge once every 3-6 months.
body.description: Healthy life starts with the use of purifiers Air purifier is also called air cleaner/freshener. It refers to the ability to adsorb, decompose or transform various air pollutants. VEWIOR air purifier uses H13 HEPA air filter to clean most air pollutants. And we recommend replacing the filter every 3-6 months to ensure fresh air. Therefore, whether it is air pollution caused by natural disasters (tornadoes, wildfires) or daily household odor, pet dander, pollen, smoke, decoration pollutants, etc., the VEWIOR air purifier can be very helpful. Power: 15 W EPA NO.:101169-CHN-1 Rated Voltage: 100V-240V Product Weight: 5.20 Pounds Product Size: 9.8*9.8*14.64 Inches

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why choose VEWIOR air purifier? PM2.5 Air Quality Monitoring VEWIOR air purifier can monitor the PM2.5 value of the current surrounding air quality in real time. Visible purification, you can breathe freely at home! Air Quality Light Our light function is an air quality detection light. When PM2.5 is less than 75, it is displayed in green. When PM2.5 is between 75-150, it will display blue, and when PM2.5 is greater than 150, it will display red. Large CADR Value Maximum purification area of 1560 sq.ft/145㎡, 1000 CFM (ft³/min). The size of the air purifier is 9.8*9.8*14.64 Inches. It is much larger than similar round models and is very suitable for large rooms. Ultra Quiet Sleep Mode With sleep mode button, the noise is less than 15db. In sleep mode, the light will automatically turn off without disturbing you. So you can enjoy the fresh air into the sweet dream!
Please use the Official VEWIOR Filter to get the best purification.

Purifiable air pollutants VEWIOR air purifier uses an H13 True HEPA Filter so it can easily filter particles as small as 0.2 microns in the air. Odor VOCs PM2.5 Pollen Smoke Pet Dander Cooking Smell Wildfire Pollution Healthy life starts with the use of purifiers Air purifier is also called air cleaner/freshener. It refers to the ability to adsorb, decompose or transform various air pollutants. VEWIOR air purifier uses H13 HEPA air filter to clean most air pollutants. And we recommend replacing the filter every 3-6 months to ensure fresh air. Therefore, whether it is air pollution caused by natural disasters (tornadoes, wildfires) or daily household odor, pet dander, pollen, smoke, decoration pollutants, etc., the VEWIOR air purifier can be very helpful. Power: 15 W EPA NO.:101169-CHN-1 Rated Voltage: 100V-240V Product Weight: 5.20 Pounds Product Size: 9.8*9.8*14.64 Inches

TIPS LED Panel Automatically Turns Off When the air purifier runs for a period of time, the LED display will turn off automatically. This is the automatic screen off feature adopted by VEWIOR air purifier to save power for you. When you find the LED panel light is not on during use, please don't worry, it is not a malfunction of the machine. If you want to check the data of the LED panel, you can touch any button on the panel by hand to restore the display. How to Unlock Child Lock Mode The remaining buttons cannot be operated in child lock mode. Just press and hold the child lock button for 5 seconds, after the child lock light goes out, the rest of the button functions return to normal. When the keys are invalid, please check whether the child lock mode is turned on. Where is the Power Cable The power cable is inside the air purifier machine, please turn the air purifier upside down, open the lid and take out the adapter. Note: Use only the original adapter of VEWIOR air purifier! Please do not use the same type of adapter for plugging in, so as not to cause short circuit damage to the machine. The panel looks like a lot of scratches The LED panels of VEWIOR air purifiers are all covered with protective films, and the protective film will be slightly scratched during transportation. Please rip off the protective film after receiving the air purifier, you will see a brand-new LED panel.

Note Please open the bottom base cover to get the charging adapter.Take out the plastic packaging of the new filter before running the air purifier.Please use the Official VEWIOR Filter to get the best purification.If you have any questions, please check the user manual. What's in the box? Air Purifier x1HEPA Filter x 1User Manual x1Charging Adapter x1 (Inside the filter, Needs to be taken out)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because I have a lot of pets and wanted to make sure that my house doesn't smell. It helps to take all of the animal odors out of the house. It is also quite and easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helps a lot with my allergies
reviews.reviewText: The purifier is super easy to set up, it has multiple modes to play with, sleep mode, auto mode, various fan speeds, etc. I've had it running continuously for a few weeks with no issues. The air feels cleaner, and my allergies haven't flared up, it shows this purifier works like a charm. The machine itself is attractive and much larger than it looks, so it has a strong effect of cleaning the air, and it has three nice colors of light that make it look modern and sleek.This purifier is also very quiet, it sounds like a small fan running in the background, and the sound doesn't interfere with my ability to fall asleep and listen to TV. It especially runs exceptionally quietly in sleep mode, with noise as low as 15dB, so sleep mode really works.I would recommend this air purifier and will keep updating this review later with its usage and longevity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got 2 of these for my home. I really noticed a difference when I first used them. Now I think I'm just used to it so I don't notice to much. They are not loud at all and very easy clean. I keep mine on auto mode and if I notice a smell in my house from cooking I just crank it up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Only 2 weeks in, works well...
reviews.reviewText: I have a fireplace and pets, so I've just been running it on the highest speed. The filter is already filthy. I think that's a good thing. The replacements aren't too bad, so I'm happy to keep replacing them. You can get the replacement filters at a reasonable price. I set up for subscribe and save and when they come, I'll replace them.But very happy so far. 2nd Vewior I've owned and unlike other models, they seem to keep the same style or at least keep selling the filters for a reasonable price. I have multiple other filters that you have to purchase from 3rd parties.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is an extremely sensitive air purifier. It even catches the subtle smells of food indoors and eliminates them. Something that I needed in such a polluted place as Salt Lake City.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Was skeptical at first but this thing really works
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my daughter who is always staying sick, stuffed up, sinus problems, etc. I also bought a First Air Quality Monitor to work with the purifier and compare the two readings. At first, when in auto mode, the purifier cycles the same 7 numbers over and over again. Like it wasn't measuring anything, just making a cycle of random numbers. I did start to notice though, when I would come in from outside smoking, if I got within 10 feet of the unit, it would change colors and kick on instantly. So I assume the cycle of the same numbers over and over again is just due to it being idle in auto mode. Eventually I picked up a smaller one for my daughter's bedroom and keeping this one in the living room. It's really quiet while idling, but if picks up on a scent that's not supposed to be there, best bet it kicks in instantly and stays on until it's all clear. Definitely helps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Great, so quiet
reviews.reviewText: This air filter works great. So easy to use and the sleep mode turns the light off. The automatic setting stays super quiet except for once in a while, it seems to kick on higher which makes me wonder whats in the air at that moment that makes that happen. It may be helping a lot with the dust in our room now. Time will tell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wasted a perfectly good filter
reviews.reviewText: TL;DR in 4 easy pins:📌 The blinking filter light is supposed to tell you that you have less than 100 hours left in the life of your filter. While the purifying aspect of the machine seems to be great (judging by how much less I'm coughing) the filter light is a liar. From what I can tell, it will blink after 2 months regardless.📌 To stop the blinking, press the filter light for 3-5 seconds.📌 I have no idea how to tell if the filter actually needs changing. Maybe when the air quality light turns red and stays red. Or maybe set whatever organizer you use to remind you in six months.📌 Posting a photo of "old" filter next to new filter. Little to no difference. Also posting an excerpt from the manual._____FULL REVIEW:Since I am pretty amazingly allergic to...the world, there are several air purifiers in the house running 24/7 (doctor's orders). The house is basically a breathe-safe bubble.This one is quiet when all is well and not even that loud on full blast AND has an auto mode, so it won my bedroom area. For two months, everything was peachy. 👍🏽Then the filter light started blinking. I thought that was oddly soon but bought a new one. Thought I got allll the luck on a heavily discounted two-pack. A family member had to switch it out because I'm supposed to limit my exposure to certain contaminates (dust, pollen, etc etc etc) as much as possible or things can get really bad. Like ER bad.But honestly the old filter looked just about the same as the new. Posted pic of side-by-side comparison with my remaining filter. OoTwo month timer, I'm guessing?Plus, replacing the filter DID NOT STOP THE FILTER LIGHT FROM BLINKING. You'd think pulling out a filter then putting in a new one then locking the bottom lid into place would trigger a hard reset, but you'd be wrong. And it's not some sort of safety feature to keep you from trying to trick the purifier because all you have to do is press the blinking light for 3-5 seconds and it stops. New filter or old filter.My purifier didn't come with a manual but I figured it was meant to be looked up online like so many of them are these days, especially since there are so many instructions in the Amazon product page description itself. Good news: there are manuals online, including the official Vewior site. Bad news: none of them quiiiite match up with the Vewior A2 (aka the Vewior Air Purifier CleanAir-A2), even when it says so. One of them told me to unplug the machine, then to use the control panel to reset the light. Like... what? My xude, the control panel doesn't work without power. That freaking paragraph had me searching for a secret compartment. 😑Found out while writing this review that you can download the manual from Amazon. Go to ORDERS ➡️ PRODUCT SUPPORT ➡️ INFORMATION ➡️ PRODUCT DOCUMENTS, then you can download the pdf. It doesn't specifically say, but I *think* the blinking means you have 100 hours left in the life of your filter and you're supposed to touch the light to see the countdown.Except...my filter light has been blinking for well over a week and if you see the photo I took, the old one still looks new. 100 hours ➗ 24 hours 🟰 approx 4 days, right? Right⁉️ Or is my math that bad???So yeah. I love the auto feature and the light that tells you what state your air is in. I love that you can turn off that same light when you're ready for bed. Purifier actually cleans the air, and a lot of them don't. All great features.But the filter bit is kinda the most important part, yeah? Expensive, too. OO
